text: On this mac, Makie (GL and WGL) is really not usable beyond doing one plot.  Issues with things getting stuck (GUI windows and REPL stall).  It's probably not Makie's fault, as there are base OpenGL issues in general on mac, and Apple has deprecated OpenGL, so can't even expect fixes. :crying_cat_face:
